name: places/ChIJUxjejqRYwokRyUJEqJzHhMk
formattedAddress: 247 E 82nd St Ste 3, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 247 E 82nd St Ste 3, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Cox for a while now and I cannot say enough about her. I would start with professional, compassionate, understanding, intuitive, patient and insightful. Basically everything you could want in psychologist. I look forward to our sessions and I have always walked out feeling at least a little "lighter". I truly appreciate that she runs her practice as a professional but not a robot. She is understanding that we are all human and things happen and works her best to accommodate where she can, which is a rarity these days. She has helped me overcome what I could and understand there were things that I could not, such as change other people, as I continue to become the person I strive to be. Anyone looking for therapy, on a personal level, I highly recommend calling Dr. Cox as I don't know where I would be without her, and in my opinion, there is no better.
